title: Mayan Arts Beaded Bracelet for Women, Blue,Purple and Copper and Brown Tones, Magnetic Closure, Sparkly Jewelry, Bohemian Fashion, Guatemala 7 x 1.5 inches
features: This beaded bracelets were created by a master bead artist in Santiago la Laguna, Guatemala, a village of mostly Mayan indigenous people along the shore of Lake Atitlan.
Beading has made a tremendous difference in the lives of many indigenous Guatemalans.
Handmade with a variety of Beads. Mothers Day
Fair Trade Eco-friendly Gift for mom, sister, daughter, and all the important women in your life.
description: #Handmade, fair trade bracelet made with seed beads in Guatemala #Created by master bead artisans in the remote indigenous village of Santiago la Laguna, near Lake Atitlan. #Fine Czech seed beads and sturdy thread are used to create this beautiful hand-crafted bracelet. The magnetic clasp make it especially easy to put on and remove. No fumbling involved! #A classy statement piece of jewelry to create a look of casual elegance. Pairs wonderfully with our multi-strand necklace, too. #Fair Trade Eco-friendly Gift for mom, sister, daughter, and all the important women in your life.
